Class InteractiveConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.system.InteractiveConsole

  • public class InteractiveConsole
extends java.lang.Object
    InteractiveConsole provides methods for interactive console operations can either instantiate a new instance or use the singleton method

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean confirm(java.lang.String message)
      confirm appends [Y/N] (yes/no) options to the message and asks the user to input either Y(yes) or N(no) to confirm the message or not

      Singleton method i

      • confirm

        public boolean confirm(java.lang.String message)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        confirm appends [Y/N] (yes/no) options to the message and asks the user to input either Y(yes) or N(no) to confirm the message or not
        Parameters:
        message -
        Returns:
        true if param message is confirmed and false if not
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
